name: Eredin: King of the Wild Hunt
effect: Pick any weather card from your deck and play it instantly.

name: Eredin: Commander of the Red Riders
effect: Double the strength of all your Close Combat units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).

name: Eredin: Destroyer of Worlds
effect: Discard 2 cards and draw 1 card of your choice from your deck.

name: Eredin: Bringer of Death
effect: Restore a card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Eredin Bréacc Glas: The Treacherous
effect: Passive—doubles the strength of all spy cards (affects both players).

name: Foltest: Son of Medell
effect: Destroy your enemy’s strongest Ranged Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Ranged Combat units is 10 or more.

name: Foltest: The Steel-Forged
effect: Destroy your enemy’s strongest Siege unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Siege units is 10 or more.

name: Foltest: The Siegemaster
effect: Doubles the strength of all your Siege units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).

name: Foltest: Lord Commander of the North
effect: Clear any weather effects (resulting from Biting Frost, Torrential Rain, or Impenetrable Fog) in play.

name: Foltest: King of Temeria
effect: Pick an Impenetrable Fog card from your deck and play it instantly.

name: King Bran
effect: Units only lose half their values in bad weather conditions

name: Crach an Craite
effect: Shuffles graveyards (discard pile) back into main decks (for both players)

name: Francesca Findabair: Hope of the Aen Seidhe
effect: Move Agile units to whichever valid row maximizes their strength (don’t move units already in optimal row)

name: Francesca Findabair: Queen of Dol Blathanna
effect: Destroy your enemy’s strongest Close Combat unit(s) if the combined strength of all his or her Close Combat units is 10 or more.

name: Francesca Findabair: The Beautiful
effect: Doubles the strength of all your Ranged Combat units (unless a Commander's Horn is also present on that row).

name: Francesca Findabair: Daisy of the Valley
effect: Draw an extra card at the beginning of the battle.

name: Francesca Findabair: Pureblood Elf
effect: Pick a Biting Frost card from your deck and play it instantly.

name: Emhyr var Emreis: Invader of the North
effect: Abilities that restore a unit to the battlefield restore a randomly-chosen unit. Affects both players.

name: Emhyr var Emreis: The Relentless
effect: Draw a card from your opponent’s discard pile.

name: Emhyr var Emreis: The White Flame
effect: Cancel your opponent’s Leader Ability.

name: Emhyr var Emreis: The Emperor of Nilfgaard
effect: Look at 3 random cards from your opponent’s hand.

name: Emhyr var Emreis: His Imperial Majesty
effect: Commander's Horn
